solution_line_template: The total number of episodes is {num_seasons} seasons x {episodes_per_season} episodes/season = <<{num_seasons}*{episodes_per_season}={total_episodes}>>{total_episodes} episodes
Joe has to watch per day {total_episodes} episodes / {days_to_premiere} days= <<{total_episodes}/{days_to_premiere}={episodes_per_day}>>{episodes_per_day} episodes/day
